name: Solenars Edge Rebirth
detailed_description:
Alcornagia, a damaged world plagued by warfare and engulfed in darkness is dying. The only hope for it's restoration is a legendary gem called the Solenars Edge, created from the heavens. This gem is in the shape of a sword. It has the power to seal away the darkness and revitalize the world or to create an army of the undead at the wielder's beck and call to unleash never ending chaos. The choice is in who ever wields it. There are many who wish to use the gem for selfish desires, but only a select few may have the chance to banish the darkness.

~Remastered version of the original Solenars Edge series.
~Embark on a thrilling adventure with a huge cast of ever changing, yet enduring characters!
~A bunch of fun secrets and mini games.
~6 chapters with end-game content.
~8 character turned based battle system with the ability to swap between many more characters.
~Several jokes and hidden references.
~Enduring Soundtrack.
~Game style similar to old fashioned FF titles.
~Over 10+ hours of story based game play with optional content to sink your teeth into.
~Solenars Edge II: Aurora of The Seventh Dawn short story book (Digital) included with purchase.

**Disclaimer: The start of the game with Emo Natsu and the chapter: Balthus' Requiem, are NOT of the actual game; Solenars Edge Rebirth. Yes, they do enhance the story, but they do not accurately portray the full extent of the game's capabilities. They are meant to be rushed in both combat and in dialogue to speed the player straight to the actual game. The actual game starts on Chapter 0: Prologue and has better written dialogue then the introduction before-hand. With that in mind, if you are to leave a negative review, please write a constructive negative review based on Chapter 0 on-wards.**

short_description: Three lost orphans band together to set out on a journey that transcends the boundaries of imagination and retrieve the pieces of a legendary gem, all while keeping the darkness at bay alongside a colorful cast of unique characters.
reviews:
“This is a hidden gem, that's lost among all the other rpg maker games made by 12 year olds. This has a hearttouching story and amazing gameplay. 8/10.”
8/10 – My Last Words

“This is a story rich RPG Maker game, with nice combat system and better design. It's one of the best 2D RPG Maker games out there.”
9/10 – Golden Frogs

“If you are looking for a story rich RPG game with good replay value, you're in the right place. In my opinion this could be your best choice.”
9/10 – That's Nice!
